ModMetaData.name: CPS: Compact Pawn Storage
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description: The Pit: • Very easy to build. Very dirty. Very uncomfortable. • Very high chance of infections and tantrums. • Can be built outside. • Fits 5 prisoners in 2x2 space Cabin: • Soundproof • Has climate controls • Has some comfort • Movable • Pawns can eat inside • Can be assigned to prisoners, but needs extra outside walls or high fences to contain them. • Fits 10 pawns in 4x2 space TSS (Test Subject Storage): • Built-in nutrient paste producer • Optionally connects to VNPE network • Optionally connects to VRE-S hemogen network • Optionally connects to DBH for water and bladder needs • Maintains comfortable inside temperature • Fits 16 pawns in 4x2 space Links: • https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5 • https://github.com/zed-0xff/RW-CPS
